com.badlogic.gdx.backends.lwjgl.audio

Class Mini2DxOpenALSound

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.backends.lwjgl.audio.Mini2DxOpenALSound
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Sound, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Mini2DxMp3.Sound, Mini2DxOgg.Sound, Mini2DxWav.Sound

    public class Mini2DxOpenALSound
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Sound
    Modified version of OpenALSound to support sound completion events
